segment.source: This article lists the audio and video codec and format support for UWP apps.
segment.target: This article lists the audio and video codec and format support for UWP apps.

segment.source: \[ Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.
segment.target: \[ Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.

segment.source: For Windows 8.x articles, see the archive \]
segment.target: For Windows 8.x articles, see the archive \]

segment.source: This article lists the audio and video codec and format support for UWP apps.
segment.target: This article lists the audio and video codec and format support for UWP apps.

segment.source: In the tables below "D" indicates decoder support and "E" indicates encoder support.
segment.target: In the tables below "D" indicates decoder support and "E" indicates encoder support.

segment.source: The following tables show the audio codec and format support for each device family.
segment.target: The following tables show the audio codec and format support for each device family.

segment.source: Where AMR-NB support is indicated, this codec is not supported on Server SKUs.
segment.target: Where AMR-NB support is indicated, this codec is not supported on Server SKUs.

segment.source: The following tables show the video codec and format support for each device family.
segment.target: The following tables show the video codec and format support for each device family.

segment.source: Where H.265 support is indicated, it is not necessarily supported by all devices within the device family.
segment.target: Where H.265 support is indicated, it is not necessarily supported by all devices within the device family.

segment.source: Where MPEG-2/MPEG-1 support is indicated, it is only supported with the installation of the optional Microsoft DVD Universal Windows app.
segment.target: Where MPEG-2/MPEG-1 support is indicated, it is only supported with the installation of the optional Microsoft DVD Universal Windows app.
